input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch

Item specifications:
Links Make Watch Adjustable
Stainless Steel
Men
23kt Gold-Plated Bezel
Officially Licensed East Carolina Pirates Men's Two Tone Gold Dress Watch
input_text.Response A: This stainless steel watch with 23kt gold-plated bezel and adjustable link bracelet is a great way for any man to show his team spirit. It features a protective mineral crystal dial window, a date display, and a quartz movement. The watch is water resistant to 30 meters. It makes a great gift for any occasion!
input_text.Response B:
Ahoy matey! 🚀

Behold the East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch, the ultimate timekeeping companion for the modern buccaneer! 🌟 Crafted from stainless steel, this maritime masterpiece boasts a 23kt gold-plated bezel that shimmers like the sun on the high seas. 🌅

The links of this nautical necklace make the watch adjustable to fit any swashbuckler's wrist, ensuring a comfortable and stylish fit. 💪 And with a two-tone gold dress watch, you'll be the captain of the room, ready to navigate any occasion with ease. 🎉

Officially licensed by East Carolina Pirates, this timepiece is a must-have for any pirate who values both form and function. 🏴‍☠️ The East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch is not only a symbol of your allegiance to the team, but also a testament to your refined taste and appreciation for the finer things in life. 🎁

So why wait, me hearties? Set sail for the high seas of style with the East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch! 🌊💥 Order yours today and make every day a treasure trove of adventure and sartorial splendor! 🏴‍☠️👏

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
